frase: When do you go to bed?
She has got a new bike.
They have not got any pets.
We don't play football on Monday.
traduccion: No jugamos al fútbol los lunes.

frase: You have got a red ball.
We have got a big house.
I have not got a bike.
He has not got any sisters.

traduccion: Yo juego al fútbol después del colegio.

frase: He reads a book every night.
traduccion: Él lee un libro todas las noches.

frase: She watches cartoons in the morning.
traduccion: Ella ve dibujos por la mañana.

frase: We go to the park on Sunday.
traduccion: Nosotros vamos al parque los domingos.

frase: They eat breakfast at seven o'clock.

traduccion: A ella no le gusta la leche.

frase: Do they go to school by bus?
Does he go to bed early?
Does it rain a lot here?
How do you go to school?
When do you do your homework?

traduccion: Ellos no están en el colegio.
A ti no te gustan las arañas.

frase: They do not listen in class.
We don't play outside when it rains.
She doesn't do her homework at night.
traduccion: Ella no hace sus deberes por la noche.

frase: I don't watch TV in the morning.
traduccion: Yo no veo la tele por la mañana.
